channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - bugreport

item.title: A bug please...
item.description:
I know contacting me (or other developers) through IRC is often fast, but having a bug report on our bugzilla is very important to me and other developers. Allow me to explain a bit why.

First of all, IRC is ephemeral. If we are not immediately on IRC noticing it â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
